Final projects

Tentative schedule

The final project consists of a written report and an oral presentation during class time (dead week and Finals' week).
Date Deliverable
April 7 Identify Team, agree on topic and dataset. Submit project idea and data link for feedback (not graded)
April 16 Submit outline of exploration for feedback (not graded)
April 23 Submit draft of report for feedback (not graded)
April 28, 30, and May 7 Project Presentations
May 8 (Friday) Submit final report
